title: Planet_Stories_Volume_4_Number_9_
creator: Love Romances Publishing Company
description: Planet Stories Volume 4, Number 9, November 1950. Published by Love Romances Publishing Company, Incorporated; 1658 Summer Street, Stamford, Connecticut. Dimensions are 6 1/2" width by 9 1/2" Height and 128grams, 114 pages. Copyright was issued in 1948, but no renewal was recorded, this work is Public Domain under Rule 6 of the Copyright Statutes of the United States. Etext created by Gerard Arthus. This issue was missing the front cover, if someone can send me a better copy I will incorporate it into the work. Due to copyright restrictions on the stories; 'Final Mission' by John D. MacDonald and Mitkey Rides Again by Frederic Brown; pages 57-75 have been removed from the publicly available PDF file; all other stories were in the Public Domain.
subject: PS-000-001
